trans-unit.source: Interacts with the parser to build an <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect" /> control.
trans-unit.target: Interage com o analisador para criar um controle <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelectBuilder> control interacts with the page parser to build an <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelectBuilder> controle interage com o analisador de página para criar um <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> controle.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelectBuilder> control to customize the parsing of an <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelectBuilder> controle para personalizar a análise de um <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> controle.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelectBuilder.AllowWhitespaceLiterals%2A> property is set to `false` so that white space is always ignored.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelectBuilder.AllowWhitespaceLiterals%2A> está definida como `false` para que o espaço em branco é sempre ignorado.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelectBuilder.GetChildControlType%2A> method to determine the type of the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control's child controls.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelectBuilder.GetChildControlType%2A> método para determinar o tipo do <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> os controles filho do controle.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to create a custom <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelectBuilder> control that defines two types of `<option>` child elements of a custom <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control and then processes each type differently.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra como criar um personalizado <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelectBuilder> controle que define dois tipos de `<option>` elementos filho de um personalizado <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> controle e, em seguida, os processos de cada tipo diferente.

trans-unit.source: To create a custom control builder for an <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect" /> control, you need to inherit from this class.
trans-unit.target: Para criar um construtor de controle personalizado para um <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect" /> controle, você precisa herdar dessa classe.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelectBuilder" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelectBuilder" />.

trans-unit.source: This constructor is used by ASP.NET when parsing the page and creating the control hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: Este construtor é usado pelo ASP.NET ao analisar a página e criar a hierarquia de controle.

trans-unit.source: It is not intended for use in your code.
trans-unit.target: Ele não se destina para uso em seu código.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the white space literals in an <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect" /> control are to be processed or ignored.
trans-unit.target: Determina se os literais de espaço em branco em um controle <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect" /> devem ser processados ou ignorados.

trans-unit.source: This method always returns <see langword="false" />, indicating that white space in the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect" /> control is ignored.
trans-unit.target: Esse método sempre retorna <see langword="false" />, indicando que espaços em branco no controle <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect" /> são ignorados.

trans-unit.source: This method overrides the <xref:System.Web.UI.ControlBuilder.AllowWhitespaceLiterals%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method to always ignore white space in the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control.
trans-unit.target: Esse método substitui o <xref:System.Web.UI.ControlBuilder.AllowWhitespaceLiterals%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> método sempre ignorar espaço em branco no <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> controle.

trans-unit.source: The tag name of the child control.
trans-unit.target: O nome da marca do controle filho.

trans-unit.source: An array of attributes contained in the child control.
trans-unit.target: Uma matriz de atributos contidos no controle filho.

trans-unit.source: Obtains the <see cref="T:System.Type" /> for the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect" /> control's child controls.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <see cref="T:System.Type" /> para os controles filho do controle <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Type" /> of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect" /> control's specified child control.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Type" /> do controle filho especificado do controle <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect" />.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelectBuilder.GetChildControlType%2A> method to return the <xref:System.Type> of a specified child control in an <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelectBuilder.GetChildControlType%2A> método para retornar o <xref:System.Type> de um controle filho especificado em um <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> controle.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to override the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelectBuilder.GetChildControlType%2A> method to check for custom child control types.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra como substituir o <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelectBuilder.GetChildControlType%2A> método para verificar tipos de controle personalizados filho.

trans-unit.source: For a complete, working code example, see the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelectBuilder> class overview topic.
trans-unit.target: Para obter um exemplo de código completa e funcionando, consulte o <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelectBuilder> tópico de visão geral da classe.
